title_cleaned: if youre find play pokemon a bite too easy heres something ive be do to spice it up a bite more
text_cleaned: if youre find play pokemon a bite too easy heres something ive be do to spice it up a bite more so ive be play pokemon a long time pretty much as long as theres be pokemon ive be play it ive be impose a self set of rule because of both how easy pokemon be especially once you know the trick and because of a few things ive notice skip this paragraph if you just want the rulesbut one thing ive notice when i play pokemon game be that i always end the game with so much money and so much heal items and i start to think about why i think that be able to walk back to a pokemon center and heal be too convenient so nobody ever waste their super potion on a route or in a gym when they can just go back to the pokemon center and spend a grand total of second heal all their mons and get back to the spot they be at before the only time the player be really push be if they be in cave but modern cave really dont hold up to og cave like mt silver rby victory road rse victory road even mt moon say what you will about mt moon but i have vivid childhood memories of get lose and feel like it take forever to navigate but since nothing ever stop the player from just head back to the pc whenever a large chunk of the game like heal items and even money have less of an impact alright sorry for the exposition heres the rule i use when i play pokemon game just to add a little spice once you enter a routegymhideout you may not leave that routegymhideout through the same way you come in you have begin a journey forward go somewhere that isnt where you come from this mean no casual walk back to the pokemon center when your st mon get poison by bug catcher arnies weedle or whatever save before you enter a routegymhideout if you black out on the route reload the save black out no punishment aside from lose a trivial amount of money that you werent go to spend anyway reload the save mean have to refight all the trainers now there be stake its like a gentle nuzlocke this mean that you need to actually prepare for your journey down the next route by buy and use heal items no avoid wild battle via run away or repel i think that be able to avoid wild pokemon remove the struggle and adventure aspect of journey down a route to the next town the journey wasnt memorable because you avoid everything except two trainers but when you have to battle every wild mon and your pp be run out and the wild mons keep whittle your health down and toss the occasional status effect thats when you feel the struggle the danger the adventure of it all make it to the next city with one paralyze pokemon leave at hp now that be a memorable journey set mode on i feel like this doesnt need explain but be able to always switch to a water type when you know a fire type be come be hella cheat cod if anyone complain about how easy the game be but play with switch mode on you deserve to get turn into a shedinja without wonder guard no use free heal on rout this one be a bite minor but some game have the convenient nurse right outside the cave who heal all your pokemon dont use it or if you think thats a bite harsh cause sometimes they have a long route follow by a nurse before a cave and then another route after the cave then just limit yourself to once per route these be some rule that add some fun to my playthroughs feel free to comment yours id love to read them nuzlockes arent the only way to play some difficult pokemon

title_cleaned: oc all of the behind the scenes work that go into turn my artwork into enamel pin feature the eeveelutions
text_cleaned: oc all of the behind the scenes work that go into turn my artwork into enamel pin feature the eeveelutions for some reason i cannot seem to post an image sorry about that find the reference image link below i realize now it be way past pm utc for some reason i think utcpst my bad since this isnt a finish product artwork and more of a behind the scenes thing leave it up but admin if not okay please feel free to take it down im work on create an enamel pin series of floofelutions floofy eeveelutions which see my comment below if youd like to preorder via my kickstarter it end tomorrow saturday march at be cst and i think itd be fun to show you the behind the scenes view of what its like after youve finish the artwork and be work with a manufacturer to create the pin i be work with hard enamel pin which mean not only be the enamel the color fill hard in texture the entire pin be make up of a metal base my two favorites i use be either gold metal or black nickel picture create pin sort of like stain glass everywhere theres an enclose space be a single fill enamel color but as you can see in some of my examples theres color layer on top of those color ie sylveon espeons head gem which be what be then call screenprinting where you pay to have an extra color print on top of that base enamel color then theres the cutouts and recess metal bite of a pin cutouts be selfexplanatory theyre the part that the manufacturer will literally cut out so theres a hole in the design ie espeons tail then theres recess metal which be where the metal be recess ie lower than the rest of the design to create a depth but not have to fully cut it out this work for super small areas where a cutout isnt feasible i also strive to make sure my design be uniform across the board which give how much the eeveelutions can vary because of their ears or tail be pretty tricky so you can see that all of them be measure in the pawtopaw location as that stay the same for this design to make sure they be all keep within proportion of each other check out four of my design below and hope you enjoy this behind the scenes look be sure to check out my comment if youre interest in get your own sylveonhttpsmediatumblrcomdcafffaaaeaadcfdbbcacfcsxbafaffbdfadcdaebcjpg eeveehttpsmediatumblrcombebcecefffccfdbbcacfesxdeabecffdeajpg title_cleaned: a onepage essay on why collect pokémon card as an adult be acceptable write brilliantly and in its entirety by artificial intelligence
text_cleaned: a onepage essay on why collect pokémon card as an adult be acceptable write brilliantly and in its entirety by artificial intelligence collect pokémon card be often associate with children and nostalgia from the s but in recent years more and more adults have be get into the hobby some people may question the acceptability of adults collect these card but in reality there be many reason why it be a perfectly acceptable hobby for people of all age firstly collect pokémon card can provide a sense of joy and excitement for people who have fond memories of the franchise from their childhood many adults who collect these card do so for the nostalgia factor and theres nothing wrong with relive happy memories from the past secondly collect pokémon card can be a fun and reward hobby in its own right the card themselves be beautifully design and intricately detail and the thrill of complete a set or find a rare card can be incredibly satisfy plus the trade and social aspects of the hobby can provide opportunities for people to connect and bond over a share interest thirdly collect pokémon card can have a financial aspect to it as well while not all card will appreciate in value some rare or highly soughtafter card can be worth a significant amount of money for some collectors the potential for financial gain add another layer of excitement and motivation to their hobby lastly collect pokémon card be no different from collect any other type of item such as stamp coin or art just because its associate with a childrens franchise doesnt mean its any less valid as a hobby for adults in fact many hobbies that be once consider childish have become more widely accept as adult hobbies in recent years such as comic book collect or play video game in conclusion there be many reason why collect pokémon card as an adult be perfectly acceptable it can bring joy provide a fun and reward hobby offer financial potential and be no different from collect any other item of interest as long as it bring happiness and fulfillment to the individual there be no reason why anyone should feel ashamed or embarrass for collect pokémon card

title_cleaned: why dont we have reverse eevee it would be such a cool mechanic
text_cleaned: why dont we have reverse eevee it would be such a cool mechanic we now have multiple pokemon that can evolve into a few different evolutions with eevee be the most well know example however we be now nine generations in and still havent get the inverse a pokemon that can evolve from multiple preevolutions think about how cool of a mechanic this could be in the game as a type for the stage normal would probably be the best fit but parallel to eevee the preevolutions could be all sort of type the preevolutions could all have different abilities and movesets that the stage could inherit that would leave you with an incredibly customizable pokemon where you have no clue what to expect when face it until it actually attack i can only see two issue with this and both would be pretty easy to fix when breed evolve pokemon the baby become the unevolved form in this case with multiple unevolved form simply have the baby decide by ability as those should still be able to be trace back to the basic form the parentpokemon originally evolve from it could be kinda weird for the trade card game in the trade card game a stage card usually have mark what pokemon it evolve from and there be only room for one on the card not a flawless solution but you could simply not mark it on the card and instead give each of the basics an ability that basically say you can evolve that pokemon onto this pokemon this count as an evolution last part be important because the tcg have some special rule of when you can evolve the variable attack very similar solution use an ability as well this pokemon can use attack from its preevolutions it still need to fulfill the energy requirements sorry if the formulation feel off english isnt my native language so the trade card i have also dont have their word in english this work quite well since the tcgs abilities be quite different from the game in a lot of occasion anyway so it wouldnt matter that those wouldnt be abilities in the game

title_cleaned: pokemon violet be my first pokemon game
text_cleaned: pokemon violet be my first pokemon game and its a terrible execution in game design ui performance graphics write etc i pick it up to play with my younger brother and sister inlaw because they ask me to play with them ive enjoy the interactions that this game have let me have with them its incredibly fun to tear into this the low quality aspects with a group while this be my first pokemon game that ive seriously play ive hear a lot about pokemon from my extend family so i wasnt go in completely blind ive do starfall street path of legends victory road its the psychic gym that break me and make me want to write this post the gym test be banal and insult and its clumsily execute you can button mash the emotion prompt repeatedly during the time window why the plot hasnt be very engage with the exception of the starfall section but theyre so short and i expect it to disappoint in the end oh the sandwich make wow superjank i can drop every ingredient on the table and the top half of the bread and still get a star sandwich that fully heal my party what be this system and why ugh im of the opinion that if someone say they like this game then they be lie to me be blind by nostalgia or they have too much brand loyalty xb i know pokemon mean a lot to many of you like it do for members in my family however please consider not purchase or preordering another game from this ip if this be what they keep come up with interrogate what youve enjoy about the game in the past and look for something else to fill it

title_cleaned: what do you look for in a pokemon game aka what kind of pokemon player be you
text_cleaned: what do you look for in a pokemon game aka what kind of pokemon player be you what it say on the tin what be it that you play or use to play pokemon for story gameplay exploration music competitive i start with pokemon gen silver so i get spoil right off the gate with a really dense contentrich experience as my first pokemon game which also shape my perspective on what a pokemon game should be an rpg game that open up the world to you to explore every little nook and cranny with lot of optional but engage content to indulge in as well as some nonlinear progression for you to customize your adventure let break down gen s progression style its linear up until ecruteak city after which you have the choice to go leave towards olivine and cianwood or right to mahogany and lake of rage both be require along with the rocket radio tower takeover to finish the game and you converge at blackthorn city for the final badge once you reach kanto in the postgame the entire region be open to you to complete in whatever order you desire minus the power plant sidequest to open up western kanto optional areas mean you dont even have to set foot in them one time to complete the game dark cave all three entrance ruin of alph and the second half of union cave whirl islands tin tower mt mortar rout below blackthorn city most of kantos rout and cave even moreso in hgss since cerulean cave and seafoam islands be restore the cave that be present here be all dense and multifloor labyrinthine and have puzzle to solve strength puzzle in some cave slide ice puzzle in ice path so with such a dense experience as my first game clearly an exploration heavy game this be what ive come to expect from every title id play after this i actually play gen red after silver and immediately felt the downgrade in term of quality of life and what not but it at least still offer that sense of exploration and nonlinear progression which start after you emerge from rock tunnel after the first three badge then i would play gen and it be underwhelming but still decent especially emerald with the battle frontier come off gen and its sheer content and feature richness go to gen and see all the remove feature for no apparent reason like day and night and animate pokemon from crystal and the radio and no second region to explore be what make it feel underwhelming to me but little do i know this be actually the start of the series remove feature every generation with no real reason as to why gen platinum be what i play be pretty nice as well and have plenty of nooks and crannies to explore and optional areas the postgame with the battle area felt like a miniregion on its own to explore since you could also do that in a nonlinear fashion gen black be what i play follow by white be where i start to notice the shift in the design philosophy of pokemon game since these be the most story focus game at the time they heavily sacrifice the ability to explore the region for this not only that but the map be a literal straight line to the pokemon league since the right half of the circle be close off until the postgame the areas do at least feel dense still and i do notice that all the optional section be behind the hms i dont think youre require to use an hm to get through the main game black and white be much the same but i be at least happy to see all the additional polish add to the presentation of these game everyone finally animate include all the generic trainers and even us if you be in a wifi battle against another player i fell off the series after this game though it wasnt until gen shield i play specifically that i try to returnand that be when i really realize that the game just dont really care about exploration anymore that be the most bore linear pokemon game ive play yet even more linear than gen which i didnt think be possible but what make it worse be that theres virtually no optional areas to explore in the game dlc not include only talk about the base game here compound with the fact that there be no longer any dungeons in the game either the only two cave in galar be both hallways and singlefloor the only dungeon if you can even call it that be also just an elevator ride i think it be at this point that i start to realize that pokemon be probably no longer a series about explore anymore and be just focus on whatever story they want to tell but be a gameplay first gamer that want to explore obviously i dont care about a pokemon story so none of the d title have appeal to me since

title_cleaned: red blue and yellow ost as well as their remake be far superior to every other pokemon game soundtrack
text_cleaned: red blue and yellow ost as well as their remake be far superior to every other pokemon game soundtrack every song be catchy while maintain the feel that their areas atmosphere instill there be literally not a single forgettable track in these game the rout sound courageous and adventurous as if the game be push you forward and encourage you to explore the tall grass and challenge enemy trainers the dungeon theme be eerie and menace yet they keep a steady beat that fit in any location from dark damp cave to abandon house and facilities the battle theme be just perfect the wild battle theme be a more robust and basic version of the the trainer theme it signal danger but its simplicity also represent how the pokemon youre battle be untrained and spontaneous the trainer theme be of course the exact opposite an intense symphony that doesnt yield until youve win both of these theme play throughout the entire game and not once do they become dull to listen to im not that new game osts be bad but they dont have nearly the same level of consistent quality that the kanto game have

text_cleaned: i dislike fakemon as much as i like pokémon art there be one thing about the art community that i dislike and those be the fakemon and the redesign first off i know how much work go into make fakemon or create redesign and i dont want work like that to be discredit and im not say all fakemon design be bad ive see a few good ones however i do have some criticisms about modern fakemon and pokémon redesign fakemon tend to be design to look cool and not unique and thats one of the problems i have with fakemon design i simply find fakemon to be quite bland and devoid of any unique personality except rawr im an edgy cool over the top monster many people say oh this fakemon look so much better than the pokémon in the game we have today and while that may be true fakemon arent pokémon pokemon be unique due to their balance in design they arent make to look too cool or too cute they be suppose to look like something that a child can bond with and most importantly they be suppose to be memorable i cant recall the many time ive see a thousand fakemon design on instagram that be just an over the top edgy dragonmonster thingy a sub category of fakemon that i strongly dislike be the ones who redesign the pokémon and at time claim to have fix a pokémons design now i honestly think that the process of redesign a character sound like a fun thing to do technically regional form and the paradox form can be consider redesign however i dislike the way that most artists redesign pokémon and its the same thing with how they design fakemon over the top edgy and bland only except they be put these qualities on pokémon already exist the same go for artists who do regional form too if you count regional form as redesign to conclude i respect the work that go into make fakemon or redesign pokemon but i simply find most design be bland and devoid of creativity dare i say it but part of me get annoy see artists pump out the cookie cutter formula of make a generic anime monster and label it as a pokémon regionalparadox form or a redesign

title_cleaned: why pokemon mystery dungeon explorers of sky will always be the most emotional video game in my lifetime and how replay it have be one of the most intense experience ive ever have play a game
text_cleaned: why pokemon mystery dungeon explorers of sky will always be the most emotional video game in my lifetime and how replay it have be one of the most intense experience ive ever have play a game hey pokemon players so i just want to share something personal relate to the pokemon game cause its be weigh heavy on me i realize there be limitations to what they really let people post on this subreddit but it would mean a lot to me if this post be allow and i really appreciate anyone who take the time to read it i be in tear just write this so hopefully this story touch someones heart this be the story of me and pokemon mystery dungeon explorers of sky anyway so let go back to summer i be in love with a woman name jess whom id know since college and we be both big pokemon fan once we move in together we would wake up on days that we have nothing go on which be quite often haha and play on our gbadsds with the tv in the background for hours before really get around to do anything it be like our daily ritual it be of the things early on that really connect us the love of the pokemon universe so day i tell jess im about to replay explorers of sky for the first time in a few years id only ever play through it completely twice as it wasnt that old of a game to my surprise she have never play it she do play the original on gba however so i end up get it on my pc to play on the tv so she could watch me play and take turn play and enjoy the story over the next few days it be amaze to see her reaction to all the cute little things and all the great twist and turn of the plot of explorers of sky i think we play it for about hours a day for a week straight lol all of the amaze music from the game be probably her favorite part actually and after we finish we would still listen to the music through the jukebox occasionally and go back to grind so teleport us to about months later she go away to see her family but have to stay there due to her father have a serious health issue and i couldnt be with her for about weeks include new years i have no idea when she be come back so it be pretty depress but when she be go i do another replay of that game to pass the time and find myself really sad play it without her the music honestly hurt to hear the next winter life be good we have get engage on thanksgiving and days after christmas we go to get match tattoo at a friends house and then someone hit our car yeah she die instantly it obviously be the worst thing thats ever happen to me i be alone again on new years and all i could think about be the music from explorers of sky and it just sting bad so the whole reason im write about this be because i be always afraid to play this game again but i finally do it my life be pretty good now i get clean months ago finally generally be happy but if i be ever gonna fully move on i have to play explorers of sky again i be afraid it would be really depress but i find myself cry in a good way with the part relate to grovyle and go to the future and back especially but most of all with the steam cave and treeshroud forest music play i never cry i hadnt since lol but yeah this game do it but i feel like i finally can enjoy what may be the best pokemon game ever certainly one of my favorite video game ever make i feel like she be with me the whole time i be play it and from now on ill always be grateful to have this game to go back and feel that connection with her even if shes not here anymore

title_cleaned: the many origins of shiinotic an overly long analysis of the most underappreciated alolan pokémon tldr at the end
text_cleaned: the many origins of shiinotic an overly long analysis of the most underappreciated alolan pokémon tldr at the end though some may find it forgettable shiinotic be my favorite pokémon of all time and im about to go over all the reason why through a reddit post of excruciate length alas shiinotic be not a very popular pokémon and its easy to see why a lot of people find it too creepy or uncanny to like especially compare to morelull most of its inspirations arent immediately obvious its never be feature prominently in any of the game and even in its first appearance it be horribly overshadow by nearly every other new grass and fairytype pokémon to my knowledge not one person have ever care enough about this freaky mushroomman to write a thorough analysis of its design its relevance to the alola region and just why it have the fairy type until today part mycological root first let take a moment to talk about its heartmeltingly adorable preevolution morelull an emptyeyed bioluminescent mushroom whose name come from morel a famous type of edible fungus and lull refer to how its spores can induce sleep hopefully you havent be pronounce it as morelull while morelull may sound innocuous merely feed on nutrients from tree root and soil to sustain itself and never stay in one spot so as not to cause more harm than it need to it have potential to be as deadly as any fairy pokémon the japanese sun and moon website speak of an incident wherein a morelull colonys spores fly into the vent of an airplane that be fly overhead put those on board to sleep and nearly cause a crash shiinotic be best describe as creepy cute its a taller more humanoid mushroom with the same hollow eye as morelull but the additions of a blank offputting smile and long green mycelium finger through which it drain the vitality of seemingly whomever it see fit make for one of the more unsettle fairytype pokémon or it could be describe as a cross between a toad from mario and the landlord from super milk chan dangerous as it may be its not completely cruel the anime show that shiinotic can also share energy with those they take a like to in a similar manner to how mycorrhizal fungi transfer nutrients from the soil to their botanic symbionts its name can be break down into shiitake a common edible mushroom that grow on decay wood shine refer to its ability to produce phosphorescent light and hypnotic reference the idea of put one to sleep through hypnotism the mindinfluencing psychoactive agents find within certain mushroom and how certain bioluminescent animals beguile prey with their mesmerize light in most languages shiinotics name pertain to mushroom and light in both japanese and korean it be mashade and its french name be lampignon which reveal that its line also take inspiration from night light lamps and lampshades the pokémon company directly acknowledge this in the promotional artwork for the snorlaxs yawn merchandise which depict a bedroom fill with all manner of pokémonthemed furniture include a shiinotic bedside lamp situate atop an aurorus dresser before go into any more detail about what could have inspire bowl pin toads appearance it would be wise to first explain its type grass be easy prior to the revelation that fungi dont actually photosynthesize they spend age be conflate with and incorrectly classify as plant as for fairy fairies have be associate with nature and therefore mushroom for almost as long as the idea of fairies have be a thing over time this have lead some lucky shrooms to be bestow with such monikers as dryads saddle and fairy inkcap as well as shroomish and breloom be place in the fairy egg group during a time when people make less distinction between medical science and magic the potential medicinal toxic or hallucinogenic properties of mushroom earn them a history of use in sorcery and shamanic rituals a trope that still persist in popular culture to this day in fantasy stories theyre often use as potion ingredients by wizards and witch funny enough shiinotics design can be read as a literal mushroom cloud erupt from a cauldron though its hard to say whether or not this be deliberate the mushroom most frequently depict in fairy stories and paint and arguably the most recognizable fungus of all be the poisonous and hallucinogenic amanita muscaria the redandwhite toadstool commonly know as the fly agaric you know the one sometimes its show be use as a seat or dwell by a fairy or gnome other time it be but one detail in an enchant forest fill with wonder it have since be adopt by popular culture as the goto look for a wild mushroom start with renaissance paint and work its way up through alice in wonderland to the smurfs to mario and minecraft to even pokémons fifth generation of game which use it as a basis for foongus and amoonguss some have also speculate the fly agaric to have religious connotations of vary level of plausibility from be the soma describe in ancient hindu texts to even be the forbid fruit consume by adam and eve in the garden of eden the amanita genus be best know for its poisonous species include some of the most toxic toadstools know to man while some be in fact safe to eat provide they be correctly identify others contain downright deadly level of toxins though shiinotic may not be poisonous lack the type and only learn one poisontype move it share some of the other trademark of mushroom in this genus include a wide convex cap cover in patch or warts and a volva thats the pink sacklike structure that form the lower part of shiinotics body a remnant of the universal veil that envelop the mushroom during its infancy in addition to amanita shiinotic be base on mycena fungi of which species be know to produce fairy fire fairy fire be one of the three name for the ethereal glow produce by chemical reactions within certain fungi on decay wood the others be foxfire and chimpanzee fire in particular shiinotics pink cap be reminiscent of species such as m rosella m pura and m purpureofusca if we branch out to other families an even closer match be the pink waxcap porpolomopsis calyptriformis while foxfireproducing fungi mainly emit it from the mycelium the fruitbody or both the slippery mycena roridomyces roridus specifically only have bioluminescent spores the anime show that this isnt true of morelull nor shiinotic but nevertheless their pokédex entries mainly describe their light as be emit from their spores likewise m pruinosoviscida be know to emit light from both fruitbody and spores other mycena species that may hold relevance here include m interrupta and m nargan also know as the pixies parasol and the spot pixie cap respectively as well as several species that go by variations of fairy helmet such as the bleed fairy helmet m haematopus all of this be of course a perfect fit for alola bioluminescent fungi be most common in temperate and tropical climates and hawaii be know as the rainbow state hence team rainbow rocket the prism pokémon necrozma miniors many color and the bedazzle bruxish hawaii be home to many species capable of produce light mostly aquatic animals and bacteria but also the fungus armillaria nabsnona whose mycelium be bioluminescent in general armillaria be better know as honey fungi for many of their species have yellow yellowishbrown or straightup brown cap that match up with shiny shiinotics such as a ostoyae a luteobubalina and a mellea honey fungi be an example of a facultative parasite they grow in the root of live tree and eventually kill them but theyve adapt to eat both live and dead organic matter theyll continue to fee on their host even after it perish regardless of whether it be actually the fungus that do it in while shiinotics signature move strength sap be obviously base on how fungi sap nutrients from their environment through their mycelia the fact that it drain opponents of their strength yet give them nothing in return bring to mind parasitic fungi which derive all of their nutrients from their host such as honey fungi shiinotics default color scheme also give it the most psychedelic vibe of all fungal pokémon which may not be entirely a coincidence on top of its fly agaric inspiration magic mushroom yes the ones with hallucinogenic alkaloids mainly occur in the tropics and subtropics include hawaii where you may come across panaeolus bisporus and panaeolus cambodginiensis yet another potential mycological reference lie in hachijōjima the southernmost of tokyos izu islands from the end of world war ii through the end of the s the government make efforts to promote it as the hawaii of japan to increase investment and property development it just so happen that multiple species of mycena fungus know to emit a pale green light be abdundant on this island include m chlorophos m pruinosoviscida and m luxcoeli the last of which be long consider to be endemic to hachijōjima until it be find on other japanese islands decades later part mythological root as mention previously shiny shiinotic take its color scheme from various honey fungi make it the second pokémon inspire by a parasitic fungus the first be parasect and these two be link in more ways than just share the same base stat total and evolution level in pokémon sun the pokémon that attack when you collect the tiny mushroom for the lush jungle trial be a parasect whereas in pokémon moon it be a shiinotic in alola paras can only be find during the day while morelull be a nightonly encounter the cherry on top be this shiinotic pokédex entry ultra moon when it start fight for territory with parasect the entire area get completely coat in spores paras only appear during the day be accurate to real cicadas most of which be diurnal but what about morelull well fairies in general have long be think to come out exclusively or more often at night include and up to the menehune a seldomseen race of forestdwellers speak of in hawaiian mythology though consider fairies menehune have more in common with dwarves include their short stocky build and exceptional craftsmanship accord to legend the menehune reside deep within the mountain forest and cave of hawaii away from any human civilization stand at about feet tall barely shorter than shiinotic and only be active at night during which time they would establish fantastic fish ponds roads house and temples theyve be credit with build some of hawaiis finest ancient architecture before even the first polynesian settlers arrive there in contemporary hawaii the term menehune ring be sometimes use to refer to fairy ring perfect circle of mushroom which can cause ring of grass around them to either grow taller or wither and darken depend on the fungus ironically these necrotic zone be the exact thing morelull do its best to avoid create its certainly no coincidence that three of the fungi able to grow in fairy ring be in the amanita genus which shiinotic be already know to draw inspiration from even outside of hawaii fairy ring lend their name to the vast folklore surround them let take a look at some more pokédex entries sun forest where shiinotic live be title_cleaned: do you ever sometimes feel pokemon wouldve look better if it stay d pixel art
text_cleaned: do you ever sometimes feel pokemon wouldve look better if it stay d pixel art theres nothing inherently wrong with d or anything but the problem be i still dont think gamefreak have properly embrace the extra dimension ill start off by say the problems that theyve be have in d to begin with theres this concept of uncanny valleyhttpsenwikipediaorgwikiuncanny_valley ever since pokemon have be d by the mainline game since x and y theyve enter this and never leave it here be some examples why they continue to use the d model in the same manner as they have their d sprites in battle and it doesnt work in d in the d game the battlefield be an abstraction we dont see how much actual distance there be between the battle mon theyre just attack on circular disc stag and our mind be able to fill in the gap of what happen between easier as a result when a mon use tackle and nudge the air on their circle we can easily imagine them run across x distance to actually ram into the opponent however in d space this no longer work we can see exactly how much physical distance there be between the mon so stay on one side of the battlefield and nudge the air here be one of the examples of the game still be in uncanny valley since it go d they havent fill in the gap that d require to be fill in with npcs this be most apparently see in the remake of once d game like bdsp character still behave in a very stiff unnatural and thus uncanny valley manner in the d space like walk on a grid but not move diagonally so they only ever do degree turn its entirely possible to have diagonal and smoother movement while still be on a grid just take a look at runescape or even in d game lufia the ruin of lore also have smooth movement on a grid also when it come to cutscenes we still have lot of things be imply to have happen rather than be show which be more awkward in d for example rival barry bump into the player in the old d gen game the character be very stoic and dont budge an inch it be possible to have the player be nudge and shake or even get push back a tile but its still easier to accept just a textbox thud in this abstraction however in a d space that same sort of stoic reaction to that situation once again come across as uncanny valley the character dont lose balance or get knock over or anything so it really do just come across as far too stiff in d the disconnect between character move their mouth but have no voice act this be make worse when the cameras be up close to their face in the d game too like sword and shield intro be right up in roses face as he flail his arm and shout about but not a single peep be hear out of him or how piers be do a whole concert at his gym but all we hear be clothe ruffle and foot tap sound i believe even black and white have something more than this for roxie with the d game we never saw their mouth move to begin with due to how lowres the pixel art be but even if we do i think itd be easier to accept this in d rather than d the colour of the character and mon arent as vibrant as the d sprites this be more apparent if you directly compare the model with their d sprite counterparts from the older game charizard be a less vibrant orange and look wash out blastoise be a less vibrant blue etc now of course this isnt to say they havent have some good things in d some of the new signature move like cinderaces ability do get lot of dynamism from the camera move around and dynamic angle but the question end up be be it worth it when everything else suffer next i want to talk about an example of what pokemon could still be if it stay d my think be it couldve go higher resolution with the pixel art and give us more detail sprites and worlds the ds era saw them hybridize d and d with the character be d sprites and the environments be d i think that couldve keep go but the pixel art wouldve need to go higher resolution to match the smoothness of the polygons at higher resolutions theres an artist on deviantart name sassysnivyhttpswwwdeviantartcomspeedxaaa who sometimes do higherres remake of the old d pokemon sprites and it look gorgeous i think its an example of how pokemon couldve look if it stay d pixel art here be some examples of their work below pokemon blackwhite onix high resolutionhttpspreviewredditjebbegmapngwidthformatpngautowebpvenabledsfdfdcebdeaabde pokemon blackwhite muk high resolutionhttpspreviewredditdtibjbgmapngwidthformatpngautowebpvenabledsdfbbdfcbdcc theyve even show it look nice with the old bite sprites pokemon crystal hooh high resolutionhttpsiredditbiyngmagif pokemon crystal lugia high resolutionhttpsireddithjszglfrgmagif pokemon crystal lapras high resolutionhttpsiredditmegzetgmagif xb now all of this isnt to say youre wrong for like d pokemon if you do of course this be just my thoughts and observations since the series go d officially what do you guy think what be your preferences

title_cleaned: a deep dive into the origins of tinglu tldr at the end
text_cleaned: a deep dive into the origins of tinglu tldr at the end this will likely be the first of post each detail the origins of each member of the treasure of ruin yes i know this be out of order no i dont care because tinglu be my favorite and i will die on this hill first up etymology tinglus name be very straightforward be the wadegiles romanization of its chinese name 鼎鹿 鼎 refer to the cauldron on its head while 鹿 mean deer out of the two the more interest one be the cauldron in ancient china these cauldrons be originally use for cook but later develop into religious vessels of sacrifice and then eventually symbols of imperial authority the greenish color indicate that it be likely make up bronze as most cauldrons be though interestingly it have a round bottom and legs as oppose to a square bottom and legs that be use by those of higher authority one possible explanation be that the cauldron be make very early on before the invention of the legged cauldrons when cauldrons be make almost exclusively by nobles and for them to show their power the age of the cauldron be fit as tinglu be the accumulate fear of people over thousands of years which i will go over later regard their symbolism legend go that an ancient king once order to make massive cauldrons for of its regions to celebrate the kingdoms wealth and engrave the kingdoms wisdom on it for future generations they be so large that it take millions of people months to move them to the capital city once they be build over the years as kingdoms be overthrow and capitals move from place to place the new kings would move the cauldrons with them symbolize the seize of political power a person ask about the quality of the cauldrons be a direct indication that they would want to seize power all cauldrons be eventually lose now that we understand the cauldron why deer my favorite answer be that this be a massive reference to the book the deer and the cauldron by jin yong louis cha jin yong be one of the most influential writers in chinese history who write almost exclusively in the wuxia genre which be mixture between historical fiction fantasy drama and lot of martial arts his book be characterize by rich reference to traditional chinese culture and value combine factual history with mystical power that roughly follow chinese philosophy the deer and the cauldron be his last wuxia novel and be the most unique of them all instead of a traditional hero the protagonist be a lazy and rebellious antihero with no knowledge of martial arts akin to the dark type in pokemon during his journey he make friends with the heaven and earth society a secret society aim to overthrow the qing dynasty and become their spy in the palace through wit deception and sheer luck he become a powerful figure in the government know as the duke of deer cauldron assist both the emperor and his underground friends however the emperor eventually find out about his falsity and force him to either remain loyal to the palace and kill the society or be exile and outcast forever he choose the latter bring his entire wealth and wive to a remote land in the south never to be find again how do this relate to tinglu in the story the cauldron symbolize a kings desire to seize absolute authority while the deer symbolize the common people helplessness to fight back together they represent the struggle of chinese han people against the manchuled qing dynasty this coincide with how the cauldron in tinglu be break the ancient chinese rituals be replace with foreign ones break the traditional norms it also explain the dex entries in scarlet tinglu be reveal to be the embodiment of fear allude to how ancient chinese history be one of many dynasties each one end violently either by a tyrant or an invader each time bring along great chaos that cause mass fear and panic for violet tinglu bring its head to the grind can be see as a metaphor for a dynasty crumble split the country into dozens of fragment just as how tinglu split the earth tinglu be the embodiment of the common people fear of the upperclass authority of the government finally let take a look at how the rest of this pokemon support my theory tinglus ability vessel of ruin lower special attack just as how the iron grip of a strong authority restrict mind and willpower the dark type be selfevident while the grind type likely refer to land and the importance of land in political control in ancient chinese philosophy people reside on the grind and the gods reside in heaven literally sky control over land be direct control over political power especially since ancient china be very much an agricultural society where people live in farm and rarely move beyond land be the people home and thus change in land either politically or physically result in massive fear of the unknown future as people could no longer sustain themselves with what be pass on by their elders the emphasis on homeland be a large part of chinese value as be patriotism another interpretation be that grind be ancient and steady like the rule of a powerful authority this can be see on tinglus body where clear layer can be see like those of mountains or sedimentary rock even build up a mountain at the top these layer can only be form over long periods of time where different climates create different layer that build up on top of one another tinglus chin also have what look like to be stalactites which can also only be form over long periods of time tldr tinglu reference a famous novel of the wuxia genre where the cauldron and the deer symbolize the greed for power and the commoners fear and helplessness in face of violence and chaos cause by those with authority

title_cleaned: this update worry me
text_cleaned: this update worry me httpsimgurcomatxloluahttpsimgurcomatxlolua xb so i dont know how other players have find the game recently but for me its be insanely disappoint each event seem worse and worse and every update niantic push out just seem to add more bug or performance issue that never get address to top it off tomorrow be elite raid day xb i reluctantly plan to be out for it despite how poor the game have felt lately and despite how i hate what these elite raid stand for a raid that block a gym for hours which you have to take part in inperson and require coordinate with other players without the ability to remote invite from afar something pretty much impossible for a small almost nonexistant community like mine ive try use campfire to arrange raid in the past but because its still close off to the majority of players nobody where i live in the middle of nowhere seem to bother use it it also lag my phone out so instead despite the fact i have elite raid spawn fairly close by i have to coordinate with friends through discord and travel miles away to have any hope of take part even then i dont know if well have enough players since theres only or others who i know be definitely take part xb i dont mind the travel part really probably since im use to all the extra travel and subsequent expense this game cause by now and honestly it be at least a little better this time since they properly advertise the elite raid day afterall i hear absolutelty nothing about the last elite raid day until i saw the raid egg pop up but after the hoenn tour i just feel less and less motivation to play this game not to rant about that too much but shinies be what i manage this be after travel even further afield ish miles to a town that have a much higher spawn density and number of players i play for the full hours the first day catch god know how many pokemon with my pokeball plus hatch a bunch of egg and do a bigger bunch of raid i even keep an eye on the journal log to see whether any shinies flee whilst be catch on auto with the pokeball plus nothing just the one pokemon i get from a research task a pokemon id already have shiny and the kinda cool kinda dissappointing wild shiny latias which i also already have one of none of the new shinies none of the regional egg ones not the much vaunt shiny groudon i really want or another shiny kyogre i get very lucky with a trade a few years back at least not even any of the decent shinies i already have but be still hunt like crazy xb honestly ive never have good luck with the tour days hell both previous tour i either break my phone or have catastrophic tech problems feel like the tour events be a curse for me at this point but this time i seriously go all out and thats all i get i spend money on the jirachi questline think id at least get extra incense for the weekend since they do list that as a bonus only to be sting because i forget they love to make the tour questlines absurdly long and tedious and literally impossible to finish quickly im hardly surprise that for the third tour event in a row i completely fail to get a shiny unown something ive be hunt since the begin and yet they make it a requirement for the dex completion to get every unown as a shiny then let not forget how they didnt put out any real info until the last minute generously make the event free but then take away the bonus raid pass that usually come with the event to force players to buy premiums or remote pass in the shop i honestly feel the only reason they make it free be so they have the excuse to lower shiny rat etc since its free so people cant complain and let also not forget how bad the las vegas players have it because the location lock ticket events always seem to be a catastrophe plus didnt the game ticket cost like with all the add extras before even have to buy plane ticket accommodation xb and with regard to this latest update notification be all of that suppose to be part of their renew commitment to bolster pokemon go inperson experience because from what i can see theyve just be make the game worse regardless of whether you play inperson or from home i mean for cry out loud if you want players to play and raid in person for one thing actually give more xl rare candy from do raid in person that be mean to be a thing for a while now but inperson raid still almost never drop them xb honestly im just so do with this company and this game right now ive have problems with niantic for years and i mean of course i have since im a rural player it felt like things might finally improve a bite when they add the coronavirus concessions because they actually make the game more accessible but they just seem intent on strip all of that back and then some and thats precisely why this update message worry me xb before this elite raid day event i practically stop play for full weeks and you know what i actually have fun because i wasnt play this game i still play occassionally because its a weak excuse to get exercise and meet up with friends but honestly even if tomorrow go well im honestly consider just quit altogether xb as a last note if youre feel the same way heres something i feel be pretty relevant httpsimgurcomgalleryasxiithttpsimgurcomgalleryasxiit xb edit fix the format also sorry for make this such a long rant i kinda want to give this post more substance by list all the issue that theyve leave unfixed for years now like how pokemon weight xl xs markers search term be still break and how poorly optimise the friends list gift be but with how long the post get i figure i should just save that for later

title_cleaned: sprite art for dbrigade expansion jungle theme
text_cleaned: sprite art for dbrigade expansion jungle theme so ive be play pokemon a long time pretty much as long as theres be pokemon ive be play it ive be impose a self set of rule because of both how easy pokemon be especially once you know the trick and because of a few things ive notice skip this paragraph if you just want the rulesbut one thing ive notice when i play pokemon game be that i always end the game with so much money and so much heal items and i start to think about why i think that be able to walk back to a pokemon center and heal be too convenient so nobody ever waste their super potion on a route or in a gym when they can just go back to the pokemon center and spend a grand total of second heal all their mons and get back to the spot they be at before the only time the player be really push be if they be in cave but modern cave really dont hold up to og cave like mt silver rby victory road rse victory road even mt moon say what you will about mt moon but i have vivid childhood memories of get lose and feel like it take forever to navigate but since nothing ever stop the player from just head back to the pc whenever a large chunk of the game like heal items and even money have less of an impact alright sorry for the exposition heres the rule i use when i play pokemon game just to add a little spice once you enter a routegymhideout you may not leave that routegymhideout through the same way you come in you have begin a journey forward go somewhere that isnt where you come from this mean no casual walk back to the pokemon center when your st mon get poison by bug catcher arnies weedle or whatever save before you enter a routegymhideout if you black out on the route reload the save black out no punishment aside from lose a trivial amount of money that you werent go to spend anyway reload the save mean have to refight all the trainers now there be stake its like a gentle nuzlocke this mean that you need to actually prepare for your journey down the next route by buy and use heal items no avoid wild battle via run away or repel i think that be able to avoid wild pokemon remove the struggle and adventure aspect of journey down a route to the next town the journey wasnt memorable because you avoid everything except two trainers but when you have to battle every wild mon and your pp be run out and the wild mons keep whittle your health down and toss the occasional status effect thats when you feel the struggle the danger the adventure of it all make it to the next city with one paralyze pokemon leave at hp now that be a memorable journey set mode on i feel like this doesnt need explain but be able to always switch to a water type when you know a fire type be come be hella cheat cod if anyone complain about how easy the game be but play with switch mode on you deserve to get turn into a shedinja without wonder guard no use free heal on rout this one be a bite minor but some game have the convenient nurse right outside the cave who heal all your pokemon dont use it or if you think thats a bite harsh cause sometimes they have a long route follow by a nurse before a cave and then another route after the cave then just limit yourself to once per route these be some rule that add some fun to my playthroughs feel free to comment yours id love to read them nuzlockes arent the only way to play some difficult pokemon

text_cleaned: digimon you want to see in a new game for some reason i cannot seem to post an image sorry about that find the reference image link below i realize now it be way past pm utc for some reason i think utcpst my bad since this isnt a finish product artwork and more of a behind the scenes thing leave it up but admin if not okay please feel free to take it down im work on create an enamel pin series of floofelutions floofy eeveelutions which see my comment below if youd like to preorder via my kickstarter it end tomorrow saturday march at be cst and i think itd be fun to show you the behind the scenes view of what its like after youve finish the artwork and be work with a manufacturer to create the pin i be work with hard enamel pin which mean not only be the enamel the color fill hard in texture the entire pin be make up of a metal base my two favorites i use be either gold metal or black nickel picture create pin sort of like stain glass everywhere theres an enclose space be a single fill enamel color but as you can see in some of my examples theres color layer on top of those color ie sylveon espeons head gem which be what be then call screenprinting where you pay to have an extra color print on top of that base enamel color then theres the cutouts and recess metal bite of a pin cutouts be selfexplanatory theyre the part that the manufacturer will literally cut out so theres a hole in the design ie espeons tail then theres recess metal which be where the metal be recess ie lower than the rest of the design to create a depth but not have to fully cut it out this work for super small areas where a cutout isnt feasible i also strive to make sure my design be uniform across the board which give how much the eeveelutions can vary because of their ears or tail be pretty tricky so you can see that all of them be measure in the pawtopaw location as that stay the same for this design to make sure they be all keep within proportion of each other check out four of my design below and hope you enjoy this behind the scenes look be sure to check out my comment if youre interest in get your own text_cleaned: a curious child oc tldr year old man relive his childhood dream last felt with pokemon yellow share your love for the game and what you like the most about it i want to share a little story im a yo man await an asd diagnosis who have play almost every pokemon main game so far ever since platinum i just stop enjoy them after a few hours game become easier and easier and i just didnt get the same feel from them in the same i do from yellow blue gold and crystal i plait them from day of release too i get scarlet on day of release and fell in love with it the sheer idea that i spend hours play before get one badge just because i let the game take me where it want try to explore everything i could before get to the school once id do the school part of the story i discover picnic shiny hunt and go around catch pokemon explore and shiny hunt proceed with the game story to boost my jumpluff so that it be strong enough to tank move and put pokemon to sleep i must have catch half a box of shiny pokemon all with only badge this be truly what this game have to offer this be what the pokemon series need to become what it use to be i felt like a kid again my switch need to be repair because my joycons werent work properly and the repair team mess up say my switch be fine and factory reset it all my time and experience just go only difference be that this time my daughter have her birthday and we get her a switch with pokemon violet she fell in love with it the way i do when i play pokemon yellow i decide to keep boot new game until we both have all three starters i think find out how to get false swipe and race my way through to the tera scyther i be determine to get back to where i be i get the scyther obtain false swipe and then i have continue on from where i last leave off only this time try to follow the story catch every new pokemon on the way and do some occasional shiny hunt for the shinies i use to have i have just finish the game story line and im now go to fully complete my pokedex and try to reobtain all pokemon have shiny exclude lock ones

title_cleaned: digimon frontier fanfiction
text_cleaned: digimon frontier fanfiction collect pokémon card be often associate with children and nostalgia from the s but in recent years more and more adults have be get into the hobby some people may question the acceptability of adults collect these card but in reality there be many reason why it be a perfectly acceptable hobby for people of all age firstly collect pokémon card can provide a sense of joy and excitement for people who have fond memories of the franchise from their childhood many adults who collect these card do so for the nostalgia factor and theres nothing wrong with relive happy memories from the past secondly collect pokémon card can be a fun and reward hobby in its own right the card themselves be beautifully design and intricately detail and the thrill of complete a set or find a rare card can be incredibly satisfy plus the trade and social aspects of the hobby can provide opportunities for people to connect and bond over a share interest thirdly collect pokémon card can have a financial aspect to it as well while not all card will appreciate in value some rare or highly soughtafter card can be worth a significant amount of money for some collectors the potential for financial gain add another layer of excitement and motivation to their hobby lastly collect pokémon card be no different from collect any other type of item such as stamp coin or art just because its associate with a childrens franchise doesnt mean its any less valid as a hobby for adults in fact many hobbies that be once consider childish have become more widely accept as adult hobbies in recent years such as comic book collect or play video game in conclusion there be many reason why collect pokémon card as an adult be perfectly acceptable it can bring joy provide a fun and reward hobby offer financial potential and be no different from collect any other item of interest as long as it bring happiness and fulfillment to the individual there be no reason why anyone should feel ashamed or embarrass for collect pokémon card

text_cleaned: digimon evo line the digimon be goburimon black guilmon renamon and the theme be pure evil and its a terrible execution in game design ui performance graphics write etc i pick it up to play with my younger brother and sister inlaw because they ask me to play with them ive enjoy the interactions that this game have let me have with them its incredibly fun to tear into this the low quality aspects with a group while this be my first pokemon game that ive seriously play ive hear a lot about pokemon from my extend family so i wasnt go in completely blind ive do starfall street path of legends victory road its the psychic gym that break me and make me want to write this post the gym test be banal and insult and its clumsily execute you can button mash the emotion prompt repeatedly during the time window why the plot hasnt be very engage with the exception of the starfall section but theyre so short and i expect it to disappoint in the end oh the sandwich make wow superjank i can drop every ingredient on the table and the top half of the bread and still get a star sandwich that fully heal my party what be this system and why ugh im of the opinion that if someone say they like this game then they be lie to me be blind by nostalgia or they have too much brand loyalty xb i know pokemon mean a lot to many of you like it do for members in my family however please consider not purchase or preordering another game from this ip if this be what they keep come up with interrogate what youve enjoy about the game in the past and look for something else to fill it

title_cleaned: what be the best game currently for you
text_cleaned: what be the best game currently for you what it say on the tin what be it that you play or use to play pokemon for story gameplay exploration music competitive i start with pokemon gen silver so i get spoil right off the gate with a really dense contentrich experience as my first pokemon game which also shape my perspective on what a pokemon game should be an rpg game that open up the world to you to explore every little nook and cranny with lot of optional but engage content to indulge in as well as some nonlinear progression for you to customize your adventure let break down gen s progression style its linear up until ecruteak city after which you have the choice to go leave towards olivine and cianwood or right to mahogany and lake of rage both be require along with the rocket radio tower takeover to finish the game and you converge at blackthorn city for the final badge once you reach kanto in the postgame the entire region be open to you to complete in whatever order you desire minus the power plant sidequest to open up western kanto optional areas mean you dont even have to set foot in them one time to complete the game dark cave all three entrance ruin of alph and the second half of union cave whirl islands tin tower mt mortar rout below blackthorn city most of kantos rout and cave even moreso in hgss since cerulean cave and seafoam islands be restore the cave that be present here be all dense and multifloor labyrinthine and have puzzle to solve strength puzzle in some cave slide ice puzzle in ice path so with such a dense experience as my first game clearly an exploration heavy game this be what ive come to expect from every title id play after this i actually play gen red after silver and immediately felt the downgrade in term of quality of life and what not but it at least still offer that sense of exploration and nonlinear progression which start after you emerge from rock tunnel after the first three badge then i would play gen and it be underwhelming but still decent especially emerald with the battle frontier come off gen and its sheer content and feature richness go to gen and see all the remove feature for no apparent reason like day and night and animate pokemon from crystal and the radio and no second region to explore be what make it feel underwhelming to me but little do i know this be actually the start of the series remove feature every generation with no real reason as to why gen platinum be what i play be pretty nice as well and have plenty of nooks and crannies to explore and optional areas the postgame with the battle area felt like a miniregion on its own to explore since you could also do that in a nonlinear fashion gen black be what i play follow by white be where i start to notice the shift in the design philosophy of pokemon game since these be the most story focus game at the time they heavily sacrifice the ability to explore the region for this not only that but the map be a literal straight line to the pokemon league since the right half of the circle be close off until the postgame the areas do at least feel dense still and i do notice that all the optional section be behind the hms i dont think youre require to use an hm to get through the main game black and white be much the same but i be at least happy to see all the additional polish add to the presentation of these game everyone finally animate include all the generic trainers and even us if you be in a wifi battle against another player i fell off the series after this game though it wasnt until gen shield i play specifically that i try to returnand that be when i really realize that the game just dont really care about exploration anymore that be the most bore linear pokemon game ive play yet even more linear than gen which i didnt think be possible but what make it worse be that theres virtually no optional areas to explore in the game dlc not include only talk about the base game here compound with the fact that there be no longer any dungeons in the game either the only two cave in galar be both hallways and singlefloor the only dungeon if you can even call it that be also just an elevator ride i think it be at this point that i start to realize that pokemon be probably no longer a series about explore anymore and be just focus on whatever story they want to tell but be a gameplay first gamer that want to explore obviously i dont care about a pokemon story so none of the d title have appeal to me since

text_cleaned: digimon x ver and differences every song be catchy while maintain the feel that their areas atmosphere instill there be literally not a single forgettable track in these game the rout sound courageous and adventurous as if the game be push you forward and encourage you to explore the tall grass and challenge enemy trainers the dungeon theme be eerie and menace yet they keep a steady beat that fit in any location from dark damp cave to abandon house and facilities the battle theme be just perfect the wild battle theme be a more robust and basic version of the the trainer theme it signal danger but its simplicity also represent how the pokemon youre battle be untrained and spontaneous the trainer theme be of course the exact opposite an intense symphony that doesnt yield until youve win both of these theme play throughout the entire game and not once do they become dull to listen to im not that new game osts be bad but they dont have nearly the same level of consistent quality that the kanto game have

title_cleaned: which title should i purchase
text_cleaned: which title should i purchase hey pokemon players so i just want to share something personal relate to the pokemon game cause its be weigh heavy on me i realize there be limitations to what they really let people post on this subreddit but it would mean a lot to me if this post be allow and i really appreciate anyone who take the time to read it i be in tear just write this so hopefully this story touch someones heart this be the story of me and pokemon mystery dungeon explorers of sky anyway so let go back to summer i be in love with a woman name jess whom id know since college and we be both big pokemon fan once we move in together we would wake up on days that we have nothing go on which be quite often haha and play on our gbadsds with the tv in the background for hours before really get around to do anything it be like our daily ritual it be of the things early on that really connect us the love of the pokemon universe so day i tell jess im about to replay explorers of sky for the first time in a few years id only ever play through it completely twice as it wasnt that old of a game to my surprise she have never play it she do play the original on gba however so i end up get it on my pc to play on the tv so she could watch me play and take turn play and enjoy the story over the next few days it be amaze to see her reaction to all the cute little things and all the great twist and turn of the plot of explorers of sky i think we play it for about hours a day for a week straight lol all of the amaze music from the game be probably her favorite part actually and after we finish we would still listen to the music through the jukebox occasionally and go back to grind so teleport us to about months later she go away to see her family but have to stay there due to her father have a serious health issue and i couldnt be with her for about weeks include new years i have no idea when she be come back so it be pretty depress but when she be go i do another replay of that game to pass the time and find myself really sad play it without her the music honestly hurt to hear the next winter life be good we have get engage on thanksgiving and days after christmas we go to get match tattoo at a friends house and then someone hit our car yeah she die instantly it obviously be the worst thing thats ever happen to me i be alone again on new years and all i could think about be the music from explorers of sky and it just sting bad so the whole reason im write about this be because i be always afraid to play this game again but i finally do it my life be pretty good now i get clean months ago finally generally be happy but if i be ever gonna fully move on i have to play explorers of sky again i be afraid it would be really depress but i find myself cry in a good way with the part relate to grovyle and go to the future and back especially but most of all with the steam cave and treeshroud forest music play i never cry i hadnt since lol but yeah this game do it but i feel like i finally can enjoy what may be the best pokemon game ever certainly one of my favorite video game ever make i feel like she be with me the whole time i be play it and from now on ill always be grateful to have this game to go back and feel that connection with her even if shes not here anymore

armor though some may find it forgettable shiinotic be my favorite pokémon of all time and im about to go over all the reason why through a reddit post of excruciate length alas shiinotic be not a very popular pokémon and its easy to see why a lot of people find it too creepy or uncanny to like especially compare to morelull most of its inspirations arent immediately obvious its never be mouth but have no voice act this be make worse when the cameras be up close to their face in the d game too like sword and shield intro be right up in roses face as he flail his arm and shout about but not a single peep be hear out of him or how piers be do a whole concert at his gym but all we hear be clothe ruffle and foot tap sound i believe even black and white have something more than this for roxie with the d game we never saw their mouth move to begin with due to how lowres the pixel art be but even if we do i think itd be easier to accept this in d rather than d the colour of the character and mon arent as vibrant as the d sprites this be more apparent if you directly compare the model with their d sprite counterparts from the older game charizard be a less vibrant orange and look wash out blastoise be a less vibrant blue etc now of course this isnt to say they havent have some good things in d some of the new signature move like cinderaces ability do get lot of dynamism from the camera move around and dynamic angle but the question end up be be it worth it when everything else suffer next i want to talk about an example of what pokemon could still be if it stay d my think be it couldve go higher resolution with the pixel art and give us more detail sprites and worlds the ds era saw them hybridize d and d with the character be d sprites and the environments be d i think that couldve keep go but the pixel art wouldve need to go higher resolution to match the smoothness of the polygons at higher resolutions theres an artist on deviantart name sassysnivyhttpswwwdeviantartcomspeedxaaa who sometimes do higherres remake of the old d pokemon sprites and it look gorgeous i think its an example of how pokemon couldve look if it stay d pixel art imperial authority the greenish color indicate that it be likely make up bronze as most cauldrons be though interestingly it have a round bottom and legs as oppose to a square bottom and legs that be traditional chinese culture and value combine factual history with mystical power that roughly follow chinese philosophy the deer and the cauldron be his last wuxia novel and be the most unique of them all instead of a traditional hero the protagonist be a lazy and rebellious antihero with no knowledge of martial arts akin to the dark type in pokemon during his journey he make friends with the heaven and earth society a secret society aim to overthrow the qing dynasty and become their spy in the palace through wit deception and sheer luck he become a powerful figure in the government know as the duke of deer cauldron assist both the emperor and his underground friends however the emperor eventually find out about his falsity and force him to either remain loyal to the palace and kill the society or be exile and outcast forever he choose the latter bring his entire wealth and wive to a remote land in the south never to be find again how do this relate to tinglu in the story the especially since ancient china be very much an agricultural society where people live in farm and rarely move beyond land be the people home and thus change in land either politically or physically result in massive fear of the unknown future as people could no longer sustain themselves with what be pass on by their elders the emphasis on homeland be a large part of chinese value as be
