i reluctantly plan to be out for it despite how poor the game have felt lately and despite how i hate what these elite raid stand for a raid that block a gym for hours which you have to take part in inperson and require coordinate with other players without the ability to remote invite from afar something pretty much impossible for a small almost nonexistant community like mine ive try use campfire to arrange raid in the past but because its still close off to the majority of players nobody where i live in the middle of nowhere seem to bother use it it also lag my phone out so instead despite the fact i have elite raid spawn fairly close by i have to coordinate with friends through discord and travel miles away to have any hope of take part even then i dont know if well have enough players since theres only or others who i know be definitely take part xb i dont mind the travel part really probably since im use to all the extra travel and subsequent expense this game cause by now and honestly it be at least a little better this time since they properly advertise the elite raid day afterall i hear absolutelty nothing about the last elite raid day until i saw the raid egg pop up but after the hoenn tour i just feel less and less motivation to play this game not to rant about that too much but shinies be what i manage this be after travel even further afield ish miles to a town that have a much higher spawn density and number of players i play for the full hours the first day catch god know how many pokemon with my pokeball plus hatch a bunch of egg and do a bigger bunch of raid i even keep an eye on the journal log to see whether any shinies flee whilst be catch on auto with the pokeball plus nothing just the one pokemon i get from a research task a pokemon id already have shiny and the kinda cool kinda dissappointing wild shiny latias which i also already have one of none of the new shinies none of the regional egg ones not the much vaunt shiny groudon i really want or another shiny kyogre i get very lucky with a trade a few years back at least not even any of the decent shinies i already have but be still hunt like crazy xb honestly ive never have good luck with the tour days hell both previous tour i either break my phone or have catastrophic tech problems feel like the tour events be a curse for me at this point but this time i seriously go all out and thats all i get i spend money on the jirachi questline think id at least get extra incense for the weekend since they do list that as a bonus only to be sting because i forget they love to make the tour questlines absurdly long and tedious and literally impossible to finish quickly im hardly surprise that for the third tour event in a row i completely fail to get a shiny unown something ive be hunt since the begin and yet they make it a requirement for the dex completion to get every unown as a shiny then let not forget how they didnt put out any real info until the last minute generously make the event free but then take away the bonus raid pass that usually come with the event to force players to buy premiums or remote pass in the shop i honestly feel the only reason they make it free be so they have the excuse to lower shiny rat etc since its free so people cant complain and let also not forget how bad the las vegas players have it because the location lock ticket events always seem to be a catastrophe plus didnt the game ticket cost like with all the add extras before even have to buy plane ticket accommodation xb and with regard to this latest update notification be all of that suppose to be part of their renew commitment to bolster pokemon go inperson experience because from what i can see theyve just be make the game worse regardless of whether you play inperson or from home i mean for cry out loud if you want players to play and raid in person for one thing actually give more xl rare candy from do raid in person that be mean to be a thing for a while now but inperson raid still almost never drop them xb honestly im just so do with this company and this game right now ive have problems with niantic for years and i mean of course i have since im a rural player it felt like things might finally improve a bite when they add the coronavirus concessions because they actually make the game more accessible but they just seem intent on strip all of that back and then some and thats precisely why this update message worry me xb before this elite raid day event i practically stop play for full weeks and you know what i actually have fun because i wasnt play this game i still play occassionally because its a weak excuse to get exercise and meet up with friends but honestly even if tomorrow go well im honestly consider just quit altogether xb as a last note if youre feel the same way heres something i feel be pretty relevant httpsimgurcomgalleryasxiithttpsimgurcomgalleryasxiit xb edit fix the format also sorry for make this such a long rant i kinda want to give this post more substance by list all the issue that theyve leave unfixed for years now like how pokemon weight xl xs markers search term be still break and how poorly optimise the friends list gift be but with how long the post get i figure i should just save that for later
